title: Replace verithos.com with relative URLs and verithos.io fallback in head metadata

requirements.text: Update `frontend/index.html` `<head>` metadata so that all URLs use relative paths where valid, and use the absolute base domain `verithos.io` only where a relative URL is not appropriate (e.g., canonical and Open Graph page URL). Replace any remaining `verithos.com` references accordingly.

quotes: направи го, като на места където не е възможен абсолютен адрес, използвай адреса verithos.io

acceptanceCriteria: `<meta property="og:image">` uses a relative path (`/assets/verithos-logo-rgb-shield.png`) rather than an absolute domain URL.
`<link rel="dns-prefetch">` entries do not reference `verithos.com` (replace with `//verithos.io` and, if kept, `//www.verithos.io`).

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths`.
Frontend changes must be limited to metadata/URL adjustments needed to remove `verithos.com` usage and apply `verithos.io` fallback as requested.
nonGoals: Do not change page content/copy, SEO keywords, or translations beyond the minimal URL/domain replacements.
Do not add new pages, routing changes, or backend logic.
Do not implement redirects or domain verification logic; only update static `<head>` metadata.
